title: Duelist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Choose a player at night. If they attack you or use a delayed attack on you, their attack will be nullified, and you will attack them instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will know if you attacked someone.

desc:

Redirection Immune
